attributes.action: Change the way Child maintenance is looked at?
attributes.additional_details: Open more doors to single parents with children to claim the right amount of child maintenance from the parent that hides or moves money as soon as it’s paid access there wages direct if residing in UK but may work in other countries
attributes.background: We want to be able to get the proper child maintenance due in the uk and to have jobs of men and women looked at more thoroughly if the reside in the uk no matter what we can access all wages and income the parent has and access at the payment from the company they work for before it gets hidden

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you want to see changes to the child maintenance system, but we're not exactly sure what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We've published the following petitions about child maintenance which you may wish to sign: 

Require child maintenance payments to increase by inflation & review enforcement: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741254

Take stronger measures to enforce payment of child maintenance arrears: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739525

You can search for all petitions about child maintenance on the petitions site: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?q=child+maintenance&state=open
